description: The alpine summer is calling! With new mountain prints, the t-shirts from the 120 merino tec line are ready for rugged summits and steep rock faces. The tried-and-tested yarn construction continues to guarantee the necessary stability and scuff protection: The material is extremely lightweight and at the same time very durable thanks to the corespun technology by the © Südwolle Group. In this spinning process, soft Tasmanian merino fibers with a fiber diameter of 17.5 microns are spun around a core of polyamide filaments. This creates a yarn that can be used to produce materials that are thin, lightweight and elastic, yet extremely robust and sturdy at the same time. In addition, the Tasmanian wool creates a proven microclimate and wear comfort.
name: Ortovox 120 Tec T-Shirt - Mens
